name: Akvelon
tag_list: enterprise-applications, microsoft-certified, dynamics-crm, sharepoint, mobile-applications, cc--win32--wcf--wpf--embedded--virtualization, porting-and-web-enabling-legacy-applications, budgeted-projects, team-extensions
overview:
Akvelon, a business and technology consulting firm, works with clients to achieve success in their strategic goals and day-to-day missions. Akvelon was founded in 2000 to provide superior IT consulting and software development services. Our clients range from tiny start-ups to global corporations, many with deep roots in the Puget Sound region.

Akvelon is growing rapidly, with over two hundred employees at four offices worldwide. We are creative, innovative, driven to excel, and passionate about technology. Akvelon was recently recognized by the Puget Sound Business Journal as one of the fastest growing private companies in Washington State for the third year in a row.

Akvelon’s corporate headquarters in Bellevue, Washington hosts top management, including the CEO, Vice President, and Director of Sales, as well as account executives, project managers, finance, and administrative staff.

Akvelon has earned a solid reputation with clients and partners for successfully applying cutting-edge technology to problems in fields as diverse as mobile technology, finance, and healthcare.

Areas of Specialization: Cloud Computing and Cloud Applications Business Efficiency with Enterprise and Custom
Applications Mobile Applications

Expertise in the following functional capabilities: Business analysis Business intelligence Infrastructure solutions Application and product development Software testing services

Specialties Microsoft Certified, Dynamics CRM, SharePoint, Mobile Applications, C/C++ / Win32 / WCF / WPF / Embedded / Virtualization, Porting and Web-Enabling Legacy Applications, Budgeted projects and/or Team Extensions
